name: Palladium

Head: Pain across top of head from ear to ear; worse after an evening's entertainment, with irritability and sour eructations
Feels as if swung backward and forwards
Temporoparietal neuralgia with pain in shoulder
Sallow complexion
Mind: Keeps up brightly when in company, much exhausted afterwards, and pains aggravated
Abdomen: Soreness of abdomen, swelling in right groin
Sensation as if intestines were bitten off
Shooting pain from navel to pelvis
Female: It is indicated in the gynecological condition where the disease had its inception in the right ovary, the uterine prolapse and retroversion, the subacute pelvic peritonitis and concomitant symptoms being secondary
Soreness and shooting pain from navel to breast
Cutting pain in uterus; relieved after stool
Subacute pelvic peritonitis, with right-sided pain and backache; menorrhagia
Pain and swelling in region of right ovary
Shooting or burning pain in pelvis and bearing-down; relieved by rubbing
Stitches in right breast near nipple
Extremities: Tired feeling in small of back
Rheumatic pain in right shoulder; in right hip
Darting pains from toes to hips

details: An ovarian remedy; produces the symptom-complex of chronic Oophoritis. Useful where the parenchyma of the gland is not totally destroyed. Acts also on mind and skin. Motor weakness, averse to exercise.
